subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: In his 12 years as a professional, Vande Velde had won time trials, team time trials and stage races like the Tour of Missouri — but never a mass-start road race.
snippet: In his 12 years as a professional, Vande Velde had won time trials, team time trials and stage races like the Tour of Missouri — but never a mass-start road race.
